units.name: TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank

keywords.name: Agile 1
keywords.description: After you perform a standard move, gain 1 dodge token.

keywords.name: Agile 2
keywords.description: After you perform a standard move, gain 2 dodge tokens.

keywords.name: AI: Attack
keywords.description: Unless you have a faceup order token, your first action must be an attack, if able.

keywords.name: AI: Attack, Move
keywords.description: Unless you have a faceup order token, your first action must be an attack or a move.

keywords.name: AI: Dodge, Move
keywords.description: Unless you have a faceup order token, your first action must be a dodge or a move.

keywords.name: Arm 1: Proton Charge
keywords.description: Place Proton Charge token(s) within range 1 and in line of sight of your unit leader.

keywords.name: Arm 1: Sonic Charge
keywords.description: Place 1 sonic charge token within range 1 and in line of sifght of your unit leader.

keywords.name: Armor
keywords.description: While defending, cancel all [hit] results

keywords.name: Arsenal 2
keywords.description: While attacking, each model on this unit can use up to 2 of its weapons

keywords.name: Barrage
keywords.description: If you do not use [Arsenel] during your activation, you can perform up to 2 attack actions.

keywords.name: Beam 2
keywords.description: After performing an attack with this weapon, you may perform up to 2 extra attack using only this weapon. Each attack must be against an enemy unit that is in line of sight, has not already defended, and is at range 1 of the previous defender.

keywords.name: Blast
keywords.description: During the "Apply Dodge and Cover" step of an attack, the defender cannot use light or heavy cover to cancel hit ([hit]) results produced by an attack pool that contains a die that was contributed by a weapon that has the blast keyword.

keywords.name: Block
keywords.description: While defending, if you spend a dodge token, you gain "[Block Surge] : [Block]".

keywords.name: Bounty
keywords.description: After setup, place a victory token on an enemy commander or operative. If you defeat a unit with a victory token, move that token to you. At the end of the game, if you have a victory token, gain that token.

keywords.name: Calculate Odds
keywords.description: Choose a friendly trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight. It gains 1 aim, 1 dodge, and 1 suppression token.

keywords.name: Charge
keywords.description: After you perform a move action, you may perform a free melee attack.

keywords.name: Climbing Vehicle
keywords.description: You are treated as a trooper for the purpose of vertical movement.

keywords.name: Compel
keywords.description: After another friendly unit at range 1-2 rallies, if it is suppressed but not panicked, it may gain 1 suppression token to perform a free move action.

keywords.name: Coordinate
keywords.description: Emplacement Trooper (After you are issued an order, you may issue an order to a friendly emplacement trooper unit at range 1.)

keywords.name: Coordinate: Droid Trooper
keywords.description: After you are issued an order, you may issue an order to a friendly droid trooper unit at range 1

keywords.name: Coordinate: Emplacement Trooper
keywords.description: After you are issued an order, you may issue an order to a friendly emplacement trooper unit at range 1.

keywords.name: Cover 1
keywords.description: During the "Apply Dodge and Cover" step of a ranged attack, if the defender has the cover 1 keyword, it improves its cover by a number equal to 1.

keywords.name: Covert Ops
keywords.description: When you deploy, you may treat your rank as [Operative]. If you do, you gain [Infilitrate]

keywords.name: Counterpart: R2-D2
keywords.description: While building an army, this mini must be added to an R2-D2 unit.

keywords.name: Counterpart: Iden Versio
keywords.description: While building an army, this mini must be added to an Iden Versio unit.

keywords.name: Critical 1
keywords.description: While a unit with the critical 1 keyword converts attack surges, it may convert up to 1 surge ([Surge]) results to critical ([Crit]]) results.

keywords.name: Critical 2
keywords.description: While a unit with the critical 2 keyword converts attack surges, it may convert up to 2 surge ([Surge]) results to critical ([Crit]]) results.

keywords.name: Cumbersome
keywords.description: A unit that has a weapon with the cumbersome keyword cannot both move and attack using that weapon during the same activation, unless the move is a pivot.

keywords.name: Cunning
keywords.description: When your commander specific command cards are played, if there would be a bid for priority, treat your command card as though it had 1 fewer pip.

keywords.name: Cycle
keywords.description: At the end of your activation, if you did not use this card, ready it.

keywords.name: Danger Sense 3
keywords.description: You may choose not to remove your suppression tokens. While defending against a ranged attack, roll 1 extra defense die for each suppression token you have, adding up to 3 extra dice.

keywords.name: Danger Sense 4
keywords.description: You may choose not to remove your suppression tokens. While defending against a ranged attack, roll 1 extra defense die for each suppression token you have, adding up to 4 extra dice.

keywords.name: Dauntless
keywords.description: After you rally, if you are suppressed but not panicked, you may gain 1 suppression token to perform a free move action.

keywords.name: Defend 1
keywords.description: When a unit with the defend 1 keyword is issued an order, it gains 1 dodge tokens.

keywords.name: Deflect
keywords.description: While defending, if you spend a dodge token, you gain "[defense_surge]:[block]"; if it's a ranged attack, the attacker suffers 1 wound for each [defense_surge] rolled

keywords.name: Detonate 1: Proton Charge
keywords.description: After a unit controlled by any player attacks, moves, or performs an action, each unit that has a weapon with the detonate 1: charge type keyword may detonate up to 1 friendly charge tokens of the specified type

keywords.name: Detonate 1: Sonic Charge
keywords.description: After a unit controlled by any player attacks, moves, or performs an action, each unit that has a weapon with the detonate 1: charge type keyword may detonate up to 1 friendly charge tokens of the specified type

keywords.name: Disciplined 1
keywords.description: When you are issued an order, you may remove up to 1 suppression token.

keywords.name: Disciplined 2
keywords.description: When you are issued an order, you may remove up to 2 suppression tokens.

keywords.name: Distract
keywords.description: Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1-2 and in line of sight. Until the end of the round, you lose INCONSPICUOUS and when that unit performs an attack, it must attack you, if able.

keywords.name: Emergency Stims
keywords.description: During an attack, when you would suffer wounds, prevent up to 2 wounds and place an equal number of wound tokens on this card instead. If you do, at the end of your activation, discard each token on this card and suffer wounds equal to the number of tokens discarded.

keywords.name: Enrage
keywords.description: While you have 3 or more wound tokens, treat your courage as ' - ' and gain Charge.

keywords.name: Enrage 4
keywords.description: While you have 4 or more wound tokens, treat your courage as "-" and gain Charge.

keywords.name: Entourage: Imperial Death Troopers
keywords.description: While building an army, ignore the rank of 1 Imperial Death Troopers unit. During the Command Phase, you may issue an order to a friendly Imperial Death Troopers unit at range 1-2.

keywords.name: Entourage: Imperial Royal Guards
keywords.description: While building an army, ignore the rank of 1 Imperial Royal Guards unit. During the Command Phase, you may issue an order to a friendly Imperial Royal Guards unit at range 1-2.

keywords.name: Expert Climber
keywords.description: While clambering, do not roll defense dice or suffer wounds.

keywords.name: Field Commander
keywords.description: After a friendly neutral command card is played, you can be nominated as a commander.

keywords.name: Fire Support
keywords.description: When another friendly unit performs a ranged attack, if you have a faceup order token, each mini in your unit may add an eliglble wapon to the attack pool. If you do, flip your order token facedown. Limit 1 Fire Support per attack pool.

keywords.name: Fixed: Front
keywords.description: To add a weapon to the attack pool, the defender’s unit must be inside the specified firing arc of the attacking miniature.

keywords.name: Fixed: Rear
keywords.description: To add a weapon to the attack pool, the defender’s unit must be inside the specified firing arc of the attacking miniature.

keywords.name: Fixed: Front, Rear
keywords.description: To add a weapon to the attack pool, the defender’s unit must be inside the specified firing arc of the attacking miniature.

keywords.name: Full Pivot
keywords.description: When you pivot you can pivot up to 360°.

keywords.name: Generator 1
keywords.description: During the End Phase, flip 1 inactive shield token

keywords.name: Grounded
keywords.description: You cannot climb or clamber

keywords.name: Guardian 2
keywords.description: When a friendly unit at range 1 is defending against a ranged attack, you may choose up to 2 [Hit] results. For each result chosen, roll a defense die as though you were the defender.

keywords.name: Guardian 3
keywords.description: When a friendly unit at range 1 is defending against a ranged attack, you may choose up to 3 [Hit] results. For each result chosen, roll a defense die as though you were the defender.

keywords.name: Gunslinger
keywords.description: After you perform a ranged attack action, you may perform an additional ranged attack action against a different unit.

keywords.name: Heavy Weapon Team
keywords.description: You must equip a Heavy Weapon upgrade card. The mini added by that card is the unit leader.

keywords.name: High Velocity
keywords.description: While attacking, if each weapon in your attack pool has High Velocity, the defender cannot spend dodge tokens.

keywords.name: Hover: Ground
keywords.description: You can reverse, strafe, and standby. You are treated as a ground vehicle by other units.

keywords.name: Immune: Blast
keywords.description: While a unit with the immune: blast keyword is defending, the effects of the blast keyword are ignored.

keywords.name: Immune: Deflect
keywords.description: During an attack with an attack pool that includes a weapon with the immune: deflect keyword, the attacking unit cannot suffer wounds due to the defending unit using the deflect ability or the soresu mastery ability.

keywords.name: Immune: Melee
keywords.description: Enemy units cannot be placed in base contact with a unit that has the immune: melee keyword.

keywords.name: Immune: Pierce
keywords.description: Pierce cannot be used against you

keywords.name: Immune: Range 1 Weapons
keywords.description: A unit that has the immune: range 1 weapons keyword cannot be targeted by weapons that have a maximum range of 1.

keywords.name: Impact 1
keywords.description: During the "Modify Attack Dice" step of an attack, if the defender has the armor keyword, a unit whose attack pool includes a weapon that has the impact 1 keyword can modify the results of the attack roll by changing hit ([Hit]) results to critical ([Crit]) results. The unit can change a number of hit ([Hit]) results to critical ([Crit]) results up to the value of 1.

keywords.name: Impact 2
keywords.description: During the "Modify Attack Dice" step of an attack, if the defender has the armor keyword, a unit whose attack pool includes a weapon that has the impact 2 keyword can modify the results of the attack roll by changing hit ([Hit]) results to critical ([Crit]) results. The unit can change a number of hit ([Hit]) results to critical ([Crit]) results up to the value of 2.

keywords.name: Impact 3
keywords.description: During the "Modify Attack Dice" step of an attack, if the defender has the armor keyword, a unit whose attack pool includes a weapon that has the impact 3 keyword can modify the results of the attack roll by changing hit ([Hit]) results to critical ([Crit]) results. The unit can change a number of hit ([Hit]) results to critical ([Crit]) results up to the value of 3.

keywords.name: Impervious
keywords.description: While defending, if the attack pool has Pierce X, roll x additional defense dice.

keywords.name: Icognito
keywords.description: You cannot be attacked by enemy units beyond range 1, unless you have performed an attack or used an objective card action during this game.

keywords.name: Inconspicuous
keywords.description: When an enemy unit performs an attack, if you have at least 1 suppression token, it must attack another unit, if able. During your Rally step, you may choose not to remove your suppression tokens

keywords.name: Indomitable
keywords.description: During your Rally step, roll red defense dice instead of white.

keywords.name: Infiltrate
keywords.description: You may deploy anywhere beyond range 3 of all enemy units.

keywords.name: Inspire 1
keywords.description: After a unit with the inspire 1 keyword performs its "Rally" step, remove a total of up to 1 suppression tokens from other friendly units at range 1–2.

keywords.name: Inspire 2
keywords.description: After a unit with the inspire 2 keyword performs its "Rally" step, remove a total of up to 2 suppression tokens from other friendly units at range 1–2.

keywords.name: Ion 1
keywords.description: A vehicle or droid wounded by this attack gains 1 ion token.

keywords.name: Jedi Hunter
keywords.description: While attacking a unit that has a Force upgrade icon, you gain "[Surge] : [Crit]".

keywords.name: Jump 1
keywords.description: Perform a move during which you ignore terrain that is height 1 or lower. This is treated as a move action.

keywords.name: Jump 2
keywords.description: Perform a move during which you ignore terrain that is height 2 or lower. This is treated as a move action.

keywords.name: Jump 3
keywords.description: Perform a move during which you ignore terrain that is height 3 or lower. This is treated as a move action.

keywords.name: Leader
keywords.description: This mini is your unit leader.

keywords.name: Lethal 1
keywords.description: While attacking, spend up to 1 aim token to gain [Pierce 1].

keywords.name: Light Transport 1: Open
keywords.description: You may transport one friendly trooper unit that consists of exactly 1 small base unit. After defending, if you suffered 1 or more wounds, each unit you were transporting suffers 1 wound.

keywords.name: Loadout
keywords.description: When you deploy, you may swap any of your equipped upgrades with your set-aside upgrades.

keywords.name: Long Shot 1
keywords.description: While attacking, spend up to 1 aim token to increase this weapons's maximum range by 1 for each aim token spent.

keywords.name: Low Profile
keywords.description: While you are defending, if you have light cover, improve your cover by 1.

keywords.name: Makashi Mastery
keywords.description: While performing a melee attack, you may reduce the Pierce value of your melee weapon by 1. If you do, the defender cannot use Immune: Pierce.

keywords.name: Marksman
keywords.description: While attacking, you can spend aim tokens to improve attack die results.

keywords.name: Master of the Force 1
keywords.description: During the End Phase, you may ready one of your [force] upgrade cards.

keywords.name: Master of the Force 2
keywords.description: During the End Phase, you may ready 2 of your Force upgrade cards.

keywords.name: Nimble
keywords.description: After a unit that has the nimble keyword defends against an attack, if it spent at least one dodge token, it gains one dodge token.

keywords.name: Noncombatant
keywords.description: The mini added by that upgrade cannot use any weapons and wounds must be assigned to other non-unit leader minis first.

keywords.name: Pierce 1
keywords.description: During the "Modify Defense Dice" step of an attack, a unit whose attack pool includes a weapon that has the pierce 1 keyword can cancel up to 1 block ([Block]) results.

keywords.name: Pierce 2
keywords.description: During the "Modify Defense Dice" step of an attack, a unit whose attack pool includes a weapon that has the pierce 2 keyword can cancel up to 2 block ([Block]) results.

keywords.name: Pierce 3
keywords.description: During the "Modify Defense Dice" step of an attack, a unit whose attack pool includes a weapon that has the pierce 3 keyword can cancel up to 3 block ([Block]) results.

keywords.name: Poison 1
keywords.description: A trooper wounded by an attack that includes this weapon gains 1 poison token.

keywords.name: Precise 1
keywords.description: The precise 1 keyword allows a unit to reroll additional dice when it spends an aim token.

keywords.name: Pulling the Strings
keywords.description: Choose a friendly trooper unit at range 1-2. That unit may perform a free attack action of a free move action.

keywords.name: Quick Thinking
keywords.description: Gain 1 aim token and 1 dodge token.

keywords.name: Ram 1
keywords.description: While a unit with the ram x keyword performs an attack, during the "Modify Attack Dice" step, it may change 1 attack die results to critical ([Crit]) results if it performed at least 1 full standard move at its maximum speed during the same activation as this attack.

keywords.name: Ready 1
keywords.description: After you perform a standby action, gain 1 aim tokens.

keywords.name: Recharge 2
keywords.description: When you recover, flip 2 inactive shield tokens

keywords.name: Recharge 1
keywords.description: When you recover, flip 1 inactive shield tokens

keywords.name: Reconfigure
keywords.description: When you recover, you may flip this card.

keywords.name: Regenerate 3
keywords.description: At the end of your activation, roll 1 white defense die for each wound token you have, up to 3. For each Defense Surge or Block result, remove 1 wound token.

keywords.name: Reliable 1
keywords.description: At the start of the Activation Phase, gain 1 surge token.

keywords.name: Relentless
keywords.description: After you perform a move action, you may perform a free attack action.

keywords.name: Repair 1: Capacity 2
keywords.description: Place a wound token on this card to remove 1 wound, ion, or vehicle damage token from a friendly ground vehicle at range 1 and in line of sight. Limit 2 tokens.

keywords.name: Repair 2: Capacity 2
keywords.description: Place a wound token on this card to remove 2 wound, ion, or vehicle damage tokens from a friendly ground vehicle at range 1 and in line of sight. Limit 2 tokens.

keywords.name: Reposition
keywords.description: Either before or after you perform a standard move, you may perform a free pivot action.

keywords.name: Scale
keywords.description: You gain Unhindered and Expert Climber. You may perform a free clamber maneuver before or after you move.

keywords.name: Scatter
keywords.description: The scatter keyword allows an attacking unit to send the defender into disarray. After a unit performs an attack using a weapon with the scatter keyword against a trooper unit whose minis are affixed to small bases, it may move any non- unit leader minis in the defending unit, following all the rules of cohesion, as if the defending unit leader had just performed a standard move.

keywords.name: Scout 1
keywords.description: After you deploy, you may perform a speed 1 move.

keywords.name: Scout 2
keywords.description: After you deploy, you may perform a speed 2 move.

keywords.name: Scout 3
keywords.description: After you deploy, you may perform a speed 3 move.

keywords.name: Scouting Party 2
keywords.description: After you use Scout, choose up to 2 friendly troopers at range 1-2. Each friendly unit may perform a move with a speed equal to your Scout value.

keywords.name: Sentinel
keywords.description: Your standby range is 1-3.

keywords.name: Secret Mission
keywords.description: Once per game, if you are within an enemy deployment zone, place 1 victory token on you. At the end of the game, if you have a victory token, gain that token.

keywords.name: Sharpshooter 1
keywords.description: While performing a ranged attack, reduce the defenders cover by 1.

keywords.name: Sharpshooter 2
keywords.description: While performing a ranged attack, reduce the defenders cover by 2.

keywords.name: Shielded
keywords.description: You have 4 shield tokens.

keywords.name: Shielded 1
keywords.description: You have 1 shield tokens.

keywords.name: Shielded 2
keywords.description: You have 2 shield tokens.

keywords.name: Sidearm: Melee
keywords.description: While performing a melee attack, this model can only use the weapon on this card.

keywords.name: Small
keywords.description: While defending, when determining line of sight, cover, and range, ignore this mini.

keywords.name: Smoke 1
keywords.description: A unit that has the smoke x keyword can perform the smoke 1 card action. To perform this action, the unit places 1 smoke tokens within range 1 and in line of sight of its unit leader.

keywords.name: Soresu Mastery
keywords.description: While defending or using Guardian, if you spend a dodge token, you gain "[Block Surge] : [Block]" and the attacker suffers 1 wound for each [Block Surge] rolled.

keywords.name: Speeder 1
keywords.description: While moving, ignore terrain that is height 1 or lower. When you activate, perform a compulsory move.

keywords.name: Speeder 2
keywords.description: While moving, ignore terrain that is height 2 or lower. When you activate, perform a compulsory move.

keywords.name: Spotter 1
keywords.description: Choose up to 1 friendly units at range 1. Each chosen unit gains an aim token.

keywords.name: Spotter 2
keywords.description: Choose up to 2 friendly units at range 1. Each chosen unit gains an aim token.

keywords.name: Spray
keywords.description: A weapon that has the spray keyword is effective against units that comprise multiple miniatures. When a mini adds a weapon that has the spray keyword to the attack pool, that weapon contributes its dice a number of times equal to the number of minis in the defender that are in line of sight of the mini using that weapon.

keywords.name: Spur
keywords.description: While performing a move, you may gain 1 suppression token to increase your maximum speed by 1.

keywords.name: Stationary
keywords.description: You cannot perform moves, except pivots.

keywords.name: Steady
keywords.description: After you perform a move action, you may perform a free ranged attack action.

keywords.name: Suppressive
keywords.description: After defending against an attack that includes a weapon with the suppressive keyword, the defender gains one suppression token.

keywords.name: Tactical 1
keywords.description: After you perform a standard move, gain 1 aim token.

keywords.name: Take Cover 1
keywords.description: Choose up to 1 friendly trooper unit at range 1. Each chosen unit gains a dodge token.

keywords.name: Take Cover 2
keywords.description: Choose up to 2 friendly trooper units at range 1. Each chosen unit gains a dodge token.

keywords.name: Target 1
keywords.description: After you are issued an order, gain 1 aim token

keywords.name: Teamwork: Cassian Andor
keywords.description: While you are at range 1-2 of Cassian Andor, when you or Cassian Andor gains an aim or dodge token, then other unit gains a token of the same type.

keywords.name: Teamwork: Han Solo
keywords.description: While you are at range 1-2 of Han Solo, when you or Han Solo gains an aim or dodge token, then other unit gains a token of the same type.

keywords.name: Transport 1: Open
keywords.description: You may transport one friendly trooper unit. After defending, if you suffered 1 or more wounds, each unit you were transporting suffers 1 wound.

keywords.name: Treat 1: Capacity 2
keywords.description: Place a wound token on this card to remove 1 wound token from or restore 1 mini to a friendly non-emplacement trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight. Limit 2 tokens.

keywords.name: Tow Cable
keywords.description: After a vehicle is wounded by an attack that includes this weapon, perform a pivot with that vehicle.

keywords.name: Uncanny Luck 2
keywords.description: While defending, you may reroll up to 2 defense dice.

keywords.name: Unhindered
keywords.description: You ignore the effects of difficult terrain.

keywords.name: Versatile
keywords.description: Some ranged weapons have the versatile keyword. Units can perform attacks with a versatile weapon even while engaged.

keywords.name: Weak Point 1: Rear
keywords.description: While defending, if the attacker's unit leader is inside your rear arc, the attack pool gains [Impact 1]

keywords.name: Weak Point 2: Rear
keywords.description: While defending, if the attacker's unit leader is inside your rear arc, the attack pool gains [Impact 2]

keywords.name: Weak Point 1: Sides
keywords.description: While defending, if the attacker's unit leader is inside your side arcs, the attack pool gains [Impact 1]

keywords.name: Wheel Mode
keywords.description: When you activate, you may increase you maximum speed to 3. If you do, until the end of the round, you gain Cover 2 and cannot attack or flip active shield tokens

upgrades.name: The Darksaber
upgrades.description:
You gain Dauntless (After you rally, if you are suppressed but not panicked, you may gain 1 suppression token to perform a free move action.)

While defending against a melee attack, you gain Immune: Pierce.

upgrades.name: Jyn's SE-14 Blaster
upgrades.description: While Jyn Erso is in your army, reduce this card's points by 5.

upgrades.name: Commanding Presence
upgrades.description: When issuing orders, you can issue orders at range 4.

upgrades.name: Esteemed Leader
upgrades.description: While you are defending, each friendly corps trooper unit at range 1 gains GUARDIAN 1 (When a friendly unit at range 1 is defending against a ranged attack, you may choose 1 [hit] result. For each result chosen, roll a defense die as though you were the defender.)

upgrades.name: Improvised Orders
upgrades.description: After an order token is drawn from your order pool, you may draw a second order token, choose 1 to use and shuffle the other back into your order pool. During the End Phase, ready this card, if able.

upgrades.name: Strict Orders
upgrades.description: When a friendly trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, during its Rally step, it may remove 1 suppression token instead of rolling dice.

upgrades.name: Aggressive Tactics
upgrades.description: While you are the nominated commander, after issuing orders, choose up to 4 friendly units with faceup order tokens. Each chosen unit gains 1 surge token.

upgrades.name: Comms Jammer
upgrades.description: Enemy units at range 1 cannot be issued orders, unless they are issuing an order to themselves.

upgrades.name: Long-Range Comlink
upgrades.description: During the Command Phase, you can be issued orders by friendly commander or operative units regardless of range.

upgrades.name: HQ Uplink
upgrades.description: During the Issue Orders Step of the Command Phase, issue an order to yourself.

upgrades.name: Comms Relay
upgrades.description: When you would be issued an order, you may choose a friendly unit at range 1-2. Issue an order to the chosen unit instead.

upgrades.name: Integrated Comms Antenna
upgrades.description: During the Command Phase, you can be issued orders by friendly Commander or Operative inits at range 1-4.

upgrades.name: BARC Twin Laser Gunner
upgrades.description: Reduce your maximum speed by 1.

upgrades.name: BARC RPS-6 Gunner
upgrades.description: Reduce your maximum speed by 1.

upgrades.name: BARC Ion Gunner
upgrades.description: Reduce your maximum speed by 1.

upgrades.name: Battle Meditation
upgrades.description: While you are issuing orders using a command card, you may issue 1 of those orders to any friendly unit on the battlefeld, instead of a unit indicated on the command card.

upgrades.name: Force Choke
upgrades.description:
Dark side only.

[card action] Choose a non-commander non-operative trooper mini at range 1.  It suffers 1 wound.

upgrades.name: Force Push
upgrades.description: [action] Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1. Perform a speed-1 move with that unit, even if it is engaged.

upgrades.name: Force Reflexes
upgrades.description: [action] Gain 1 dodge token.

upgrades.name: Saber Throw
upgrades.description: [action] Choose 1 of your melee weapons. Perform a ranged attack with the weapon against an enemy unit at range 1-2, using half of that weapon's dice, rounded up. This is treated as an attack action.

upgrades.name: Jedi Mind Trick
upgrades.description: Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1-2. It gains 2 suppression tokens.

upgrades.name: Anger
upgrades.description: After you suffer 1 or more wounds, gain 1 aim token.

upgrades.name: Hope
upgrades.description:
Light Side only.

You gain Inspire 1 (After your rally step, remove up to 1 suppression token from another friendly unit at range 1-2.)

upgrades.name: Force Guidance
upgrades.description: Choose up to 2 friendly units at range 1-2. Each chosen unit gains 1 surge token.

upgrades.name: Fear
upgrades.description: You gain Demoralize 1 (After your Rally step, an enemy unit range 1-2 gains up to 1 suppression token.)

upgrades.name: Electro Grappling Line
upgrades.description: [Action] Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight. It gains 2 immobilize tokens and 2 suppression tokens.

upgrades.name: Personal Combat Shield
upgrades.description: You gain Shielded 1 (You have 1 shield token.) and Recharge 1 (When you recover flip 1 inactive shield token.)

upgrades.name: Electrobinoculars
upgrades.description: You gain [Card Action] Spotter 1 (Choose 1 friendly unit at range 1. That unit gains 1 aim token.) B1 Battle Droids can ignore this card's Gear upgrade icon requirement.

upgrades.name: JT-12 Jetpacks
upgrades.description: While equipped to Clone Captain Rex, reduce this cards points by 5.  You gain [Jump 2]

upgrades.name: Barrage Generator
upgrades.description: While performing a ranged attack with a weapon that has FIXED, add 2 white attack dice and apply SUPPRESSIVE to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: Overcharged Generator
upgrades.description: While performing a ranged attack with a weapon that has FIXED, add 1 black attack die and apply IMPACT 1 to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: Fragmentation Grenades
upgrades.description: While this weapon is in your attack pool, you gain attack "[surge]: [crit]."

upgrades.name: Smoke Grenades
upgrades.description: You gain [Card Action] Smoke 1 (Place 1 smoke token within range 1 and in line of sight of your unit leader.)

upgrades.name: EMP "Droid Poppers"
upgrades.description: While

restrictions.name: TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank only.
TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank only.

upgrades.name: DLT-19 Stormtrooper
upgrades.description: Add 1 DLT-19 Stormtrooper mini

upgrades.name: HH-12 Stormtrooper
upgrades.description: Add 1 HH-12 Stormtrooper mini

upgrades.name: MPL-57 Ion Trooper
upgrades.description: Add 1 MPL-57 ion trooper figure

upgrades.name: Z-6 Trooper
upgrades.description: Add 1 Z-6 Trooper mini

upgrades.name: T-7 Ion Snowtrooper
upgrades.description: Add 1 T-7 Ion trooper figure

upgrades.name: Scatter Gun Trooper
upgrades.description: Add 1 Scatter Gun Trooper figure

upgrades.name: MPL-57 Barrage Trooper
upgrades.description: Add 1 MPL-57 barrage trooper mini

upgrades.name: Flametrooper
upgrades.description: Add 1 Flametrooper figure

upgrades.name: DH-447 Sniper
upgrades.description: Add 1 DH-447 Sniper mini

upgrades.name: Proton Charge Saboteur
upgrades.description: Add 1 Proton Charge Saboteur mini

upgrades.name: Electrostaff Guard
upgrades.description: Add 1 electrostaff guard mini. While defending against a melee attack, you gain Immune: Pierce (Pierce cannot be used against you.)

upgrades.name: Rebel Trooper Captain
upgrades.description: Add 1 Rebel Trooper Captain mini. You gain a Training upgrade icon. When you activate, you cannot remove supression tokens or be supressed during this activation.

upgrades.name: Rebel Trooper Specialist
upgrades.description: Add 1 Rebel Trooper Captain mini. You gain a Gear upgrade icon. [action] Gain 1 aim, dodge, or surge token.

upgrades.name: Storm Trooper Captain
upgrades.description: Add 1 Storm Trooper Captain mini. You gain a Training upgrade icon. When you activate, you cannot remove supression tokens or be supressed during this activation.

upgrades.name: Stormtrooper Specialist

upgrades.name: OOM-Series Battle Droid
upgrades.description: Add 1 OOM-Series Battle Droid mini. When you use Coordinate, you can issue an order at range 1-2 instead of range 1.

upgrades.name: B1 Security Droid
upgrades.description: Add 1 B1 Security Droid mini. When you activate, lose AI: Attack until the end of this activation.

upgrades.name: General Weiss
upgrades.description: [action] Until the end of your activation, you gain [Arsenal 2]

upgrades.name: Wedge Antilles
upgrades.description: [action] Until the end of your activation, you gain [Full Pivot].

upgrades.name: First Sergeant Arbmab
upgrades.description: Imperial only. Ground Vehicle only. You gain [Tactical 1]

upgrades.name: Imperial Hammers Elite Armor Pilot
upgrades.description: Imperial only. Ground Vehicle only. You gain "[Surge Attack]: [Hit]"

upgrades.name: Ryder Azadi
upgrades.description: Rebel only. Repulsor Vehicle only. While performing a move, increase or decrease your maximum speed by 1.

upgrades.name: Outer Rim Speeder Jockey
upgrades.description: Rebel only. Repulsor Vehicle only. You gain [Cover 1]

upgrades.name: Veteran Clone Pilot
upgrades.description: While you or a friendly clone trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight attacks or defends, you and that units can spend each other's aim,dodge and surge tokens.  During the End Phase ready this card.

upgrades.name: Plo Koon
upgrades.description: free action: until the end of you activation, you gain [Agile 2]

upgrades.name: Lok Durd

restrictions.name: AAT Trade Federation Battle Tank only

upgrades.description: You lose [AI: Attack], even while this card is exhausted. free action: Until the end of your activation, each of your weapons gains [Suppressive]

upgrades.name: OOM-Series Droid Pilot

restrictions.name: AAT Trade Federation Battle Tank only

upgrades.description: You gain [Coordinate: Droid Trooper]

upgrades.name: T-Series Tactical Droid Pilot

restrictions.name: AAT Trade Federation Battle Tank only

upgrades.description: You lose [AI: Attack].  You gain [Field Commander]

upgrades.name: Duck and Cover
upgrades.description: While defending against a ranged attack, during the Apply Dodge and Cover step, you may gain 1 suppression token.

upgrades.name: Hunter
upgrades.description: While attacking a wounded trooper unit, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may gain 1 aim token.

upgrades.name: Tenacity
upgrades.description: While performing a melee attack, if you are wounded or if one or more of your minis have been defeated, add 1 red attack die to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: Overwatch
upgrades.description: You gain Sentinel. (Your standby range is 1-3.)

upgrades.name: Endurance
upgrades.description: At the end of the Activation phase, you may remove 1 suppression token.

upgrades.name: Offensive Push
upgrades.description: While performaing a move, gain Tactical 1 (After you perform a standard move, gain 1 aim token.)

commandCards.name: Standing Orders
commandCards.description: At the end of the Command Phase, return this card to your hand.

commandCards.name: Son of Skywalker
commandCards.description: When Luke performs his first attack he may make an additional attack.

commandCards.name: My Ally is the Force
commandCards.description: When a friendly trooper unit is activated it gains a dodge token.

commandCards.name: Return of the Jedi
commandCards.description: When Luke Skywalker is issued an order, he gains 1 dodge token. When Luke Skywalker activates, each friendly trooper at range 1-3 of him may remove 1 suppression token.

commandCards.name: Implacable
commandCards.description: At the end of Darth Vader's first activation, he may suffer 1 wound to shuffle his order token into the order pool. During Darth Vader's second activation, he performs 1 fewer action.

commandCards.name: New Ways to Motivate Them
commandCards.description: When a friendly non-Darth Vader trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, it may suffer 1 wound to perform 1 free action.

commandCards.name: Master of Evil
commandCards.description: When Darth Vader is issued an order, he gains 1 dodge token. When Darth Vader activates, each enemy trooper at range 1-2 of him gains 3 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: Maximum Firepower
commandCards.description: At the end of General Veers´ activation, he may perform an attack using the following weapon:

commandCards.name: Evasive Maneuvers
commandCards.description: When a friendly vehicle unit is issued an order it gains 1 dodge token. Friendly vehicle units can spend dodge tokens to cancel critical hit results.

commandCards.name: Imperial Discipline
commandCards.description: When a friendly unit is issued an order it may recover.

commandCards.name: Coordinated Bombardment
commandCards.description: At the end of Leia Organa's activation, you may perform up to 3 attacks against different enemy units using the following weapon:

commandCards.name: No Time for Sorrows
commandCards.description: When a friendly Trooper unit is issued an order, it may perform a speed-1 move.

commandCards.name: Somebody Has to Save Our Skins
commandCards.description: After Leia Organa's activation, you may choose a friendly unit at range 1-2 with a faceup order token and activate it.

commandCards.name: Sorry About the Mess
commandCards.description: While building a command hand, treat this card as though it has 1 pip. When Han Solo is issued an order, he gains 1 aim token and 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Reckless Diversion
commandCards.description: When an enemy unit performs an attack, it must attack a trooper unit that has a faceup order token, if available.

commandCards.name: Change of Plans
commandCards.description: When this card is revealed, you may discard it to return an opponents command card to their hand. If you do, return to the Select Command Card step. That opponent cannot select the command card that was returned to their hand.

commandCards.name: And Now... You Will Die
commandCards.description: During Emperor Palpatine's activation, he may suffer 1 wound and gain 1 suppression token to perform an attack. He may do this any number of times. After Emperor Palpatine performs an attack, the defender gains 1 immobilized token.

commandCards.name: Give in to Your Anger
commandCards.description: Before an opponent would activate their first unit, you may choose an enemy trooper unit. If you do, your opponent must activate that unit instead. Assign it an order token from its order pool unless it has a faceup order token. At the end of that unit's activation, if it did not perform an attack, it gains 4 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: Whipcord Launcher
commandCards.description: Boba Fett can perform moves while engaged with a unit that has 1 or more immobilized tokens. During Boba Fett's activation he gains: [card action] Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight. It gains 2 immobilized tokens and 2 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: ZX Flame Projector
commandCards.description: During Boba Fett's activation he gains the following weapons:

commandCards.name: Z-6 Jetpack Rocket
commandCards.description: During Boba Fett's activation he gains the following weapons:

commandCards.name: Common Cause
commandCards.description: After Chewbacca activates, if Luke Skywalker has a faceup order token, he may activate. After Luke Skywalker activates, if Chewbacca has a faceup order token, he may activate.

commandCards.name: Brains and Brawn
commandCards.description: While Leia Organa is performing a ranged attack, if Chewbacca is not engaged and has line of sight to and is at range 1-3 of the defender, add one of his ranged weapons to the attack pool.

commandCards.name: Notorious Scoundrels
commandCards.description: Choose one of Han Solo's command cards in your discard pile. Return that card to your hand.

commandCards.name: Sabotaged Communications
commandCards.description: Your opponent must issue orders to 1 fewer unit than is indicated on their command card to a minimum of 1.

commandCards.name: Turning the Tide
commandCards.description: Each friendly support or heavy unit gains Inspire 2.

commandCards.name: Covering Fire
commandCards.description: After a friendly corps unit performs a ranged attack, another friendly unit at range 1-2 may gain 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Covert Observation
commandCards.description: Look at up to 2 random command cards from an opponent's hand.

commandCards.name: Coordinated Fire
commandCards.description: After a friendly corps unit performs a ranged attack, if it spent 1 or more aim tokens, another friendly unit at range 1–2 may gain 1 aim token.

commandCards.name: Rebellious
commandCards.description: Jyn Erso gains Charge. Once per round, when an enemy unit at range 1-2 and in line of sight of Jyn Erso activates, before it performs its Rally step, Jyn Erso may gain 1 suppression token to either perform an attack against that unit or to perform a free move action.

commandCards.name: Trust Goes Both Ways
commandCards.description: Jyn Erso gains Inspire 2. When Jyn Erso issues an order to another friendly trooper unit, that unit gains Teamwork: Jyn Erso.

commandCards.name: Complete the Mission
commandCards.description: Jyn Erso gains Low Profile. When a friendly trooper unit is issued an order, it may gain 1 suppression token. When a friendly trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, during its activation, it cannot become panicked or suppressed. At the end of that unit's activation, it may remove 1 suppression token.

commandCards.name: Voracious Ambition
commandCards.description: At the start of the Activation Phase place 3 random order tokens from your order pool face down on this card. You may look at these order tokens at any time. When you would draw an order token from your order pool, you may choose 1 order token on this card and use that order token instead.

commandCards.name: Deploy the Garrison
commandCards.description: At the start of the Activation Phase, choose up to 2 friendly trooper units that have faceup order tokens. Each chosen unit may perform a free standby action.

commandCards.name: Annihilation Looms
commandCards.description: Each trooper unit gains 1 suppression token. If it is round 5 or 6, each trooper unit gains 1 additional suppression token.

commandCards.name: Explosions!
commandCards.description: During the round this card is played Sabine Wren gains →Arm 2: Thermal Charge. After she performs this action, she may perform a speed-1 move. Until the end of the game Sabine Wren gains Detonate 2: Thermal Charge. Do not discard this card from play.

commandCards.name: Symbol of Rebellion
commandCards.description: When Sabine Wren activates she recovers. During Sabine Wren's activation, you may place 1 grafiti token at range 1 and in line of sight of her, touching a piece of non-area terrain.

commandCards.name: Legacy of Mandalore
commandCards.description: Sabine Wren gains Inspire 1. When Sabine Wren issues an order to a Commander, Operative, or Special Forces unit, she gains either 1 aim token or 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Merciless Munitions
commandCards.description:
During the round this card is played Bossk gains →Arm 1: Dioxis Charge. After he performs this action, he may perform a speed-1 move. Until the end of the game Bossk gains Detonate 1: Dioxis Charge.

After a trooper unit defends against an attack made by your dioxis charge, it gains 1 poison token.Do not discard this card from play.

commandCards.name: Reptillian Rampage
commandCards.description: During Bossk's activation he can perform up to 2 attack actions and he may suffer 1 wound to perform a free move action.

commandCards.name: Lying in Wait
commandCards.description: Bossk gains Sharpshooter 1. After an enemy unit activates, Bossk gains 1 aim token.

commandCards.name: Trained in Your Jedi Arts
commandCards.description: General Grievous gains Disengage and 1 dodge token. At the end of his activation he may perform an attack against each enemy unit at range 1 using the following weapon:

commandCards.name: Supreme Commander
commandCards.description: General Grievous gains 1 surge token for each friendly trooper unit at range 1. While another friendly trooper unit has a faceup order token, it gains Guardian 2 and can use Guardian during a melee attack.

commandCards.name: Crush Them!
commandCards.description: When General Grievous issues an order to a unit, that unit gains 1 surge token for each defeated enemy unit.

commandCards.name: Hello There
commandCards.description: Obi-Wan Kenobi gains Nimble. At the start of the Activation Phase, Obi-Wan Kenobi gains 1 aim, 1 dodge, 1 standby, or 1 surge token for each enemy unit at range 1-2.

commandCards.name: Knowledge and Defense
commandCards.description: Obi-Wan Kenobi gains 1 dodge token for each other friendly trooper unit at range 1. Obi-Wan Kenobi can use Guardian during a melee attack.

commandCards.name: General Kenobi
commandCards.description: When Obi-Wan Kenobi issues an order to a unit, that unit gains 1 surge token for each other friendly unit at range 1 of it.

commandCards.name: Fear, Surprise, Intimidation
commandCards.description: Count Dooku gains Arsenal 2 and Relentless, and each of his ranged weapons gains Versatile. After he performs an attack, each defender gains 2 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: Double the Fall
commandCards.description: At the start of Activation phase, if Count Dooku has a faceup order token, he may return it to his order pool to choose up to 2 enemy units at range 1-2 and return their order tokens to their order pool.

commandCards.name: You Disappoint Me
commandCards.description: When Count Dooku issues an order to a unit, that unit gains 1 dodge token. After Count Dooku performs a ranged attack against a trooper unit, he may perform a speed-2 move with that unit.

commandCards.name: You Can Call Me Captain
commandCards.description: Captain Rex gains Fire Support. When using Fire Support, his order token is not flipped upside down. When a friendly unit attacks in melee, Rex can use Fire Support to add a ranged weapon to that attack.

commandCards.name: Eat this, Clankers!
commandCards.description: When a friendly trooper unit performs a ranged attack while having a faceup order token and an Aim token, during the "gather a attack dice pool" step that unit can increase the maximum range of every weapon by 1 (to a maximum of 4).

commandCards.name: We're Not Programmed
commandCards.description: Clone Captain Rex gains Inspire 2 and 2 surge tokens. When Clone Captain Rex activates, he recovers.

commandCards.name: You Serve Your Master Well
commandCards.description: Luke Skywalker gains: [action] Choose a friendly non-Commander, non-Operative trooper unit at range 1, or a suppressed enemy non-Commander, non-Operative trooper unit at range 1. Performa 1 free move or attack action with that unit. If it is an enemy unit, it can attack and start a melee with other enemy units.

commandCards.name: Full of Surprises
commandCards.description: Luke Skywalker gains 1 dodge token. While defending, he rolls a number of additional dice equal to his courage value minus the number of suppression tokens he has.

commandCards.name: I Am a Jedi
commandCards.description: Luke Skywalker gains "[Block Surge] : [Block]" and cannot perform attacks. When he is issued an order, he may choose up to 2 enemy troopers units at range 1. Those units cannot perform attacks.

commandCards.name: Vader's Might
commandCards.description: Darth Vader gains: [action] Choose another non-heavy unit at range 1 and place that unit on the battlefield within range 1 and height 1 of its current position. Then, if it is an enemy unit, roll 1 white defense die for each mini in the unit. The unit suffers 1 wound for each [block] and [Block Surge] result.

commandCards.name: Fear and Dead Men
commandCards.description: While Darth Vader uses Deflect, the attacker suffers 1 wound for each blank result, instead of each [Block Surge] result. When an enemy unit at range 1-2 and in line of sight of Darth Vader activates, Darth Vader gains 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Darkness Descends
commandCards.description: When Darth Vader is issued an order, he gains 2 surge tokens. This card may be revealed at the start of the Deploy Units step. If it is, it must be selected during round 1. Darth Vader gains Infiltrate and Scout 1. and he must be deployed at the end of setup.

commandCards.name: Blast Off!
commandCards.description: R2-D2 increases his maximum speed by 1, and gains 1 dodge token, 1 suppression token, Disengage, and Card Action icon-2Jump 1

commandCards.name: Impromptu Immolation
commandCards.description: After R2-D2 performs an attack, he may perform a free move action. During R2-D2's activation, he gains the following weapon

commandCards.name: Smoke Screen
commandCards.description: When R2-D2 issues an order to another friendliy trooper unit, it may perform speed-1-move. At the start of the Activation Phase, R2-D2 may perfom the following: Smoke 1

commandCards.name: Crack Shot
commandCards.description: Cassian Andor gains [Gunslinger] and 1 aim token. At the end of his activation, he may gain 1 supression token and he gains 1 standby token.

commandCards.name: Sacrifice
commandCards.description: K-2SO gains [Guardian 4]. At the end of K-2SO's activation, you may choose another friendly [Commander] or [Operative] unit at range 1 and in line of sight of K-2SO. If you do, defeat K-2SO and enemy units cannon perform ranged attacks against the chosen unit until the end of this round.

commandCards.name: Last Stand
commandCards.description: When Cassian Andor issues and order to a [Commander] or [Operative] unit, that unit gains [Indomitable] and gains 1 aim, 1 dodge, or 1 supression token for each wound token that unit has up to 3.

commandCards.name: Volunteer Mission
commandCards.description: When Cassian Andor issues an order to a [Commander], [Operative], or [Special Forces] unit, that unit recovers, gains [Danger Sense 1], and may gain 1 supression token.

commandCards.name: Incapacitate
commandCards.description: During Iden Versio's activation, you may choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight of Iden's ID10 Seeker Droid. That unit gains 3 supression tokens. Then, if it is a [Corps] unit that has not activated this round, assign it a facedown order token from its order pool or flip its order token facedown.

commandCards.name: Pulse Scan
commandCards.description: Iden Versio gains [Sharpshooter 2] and 1 aim token. At the end of her activation, she gains 1 dodge token and 1 standby token.

commandCards.name: Concussive Blast
commandCards.description: When Iden Versio activates, she recovers. During Iden Versio's activation, she gains the following weapon

commandCards.name: Tactical Strike
commandCards.description: When Iden Versio or a friendly [Operative] unit that has a faceup order token activates, it may reduce its maximum speed to 1. If it does, it gains [Steady] and [Tactical 1].
